messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

You are visiting Disneyland. You hit the entrance and you see two passages, one on the right and one on the left. You choose the passage on the right and enter Tomorrowland. You see two attractions in Tomorrowland, Autopia and Space Mountain. Autopia has a wait time of 20 minutes, and Space Mountain has a wait time of 10 minutes. You go back to the Entrance. This time you choose the passage on the left and you go to Fantasyland. Again, you see two attractions, Mad Tea Party and Peter Pan's Flight. Mad Tea Party has a wait time of 5 minutes, and Peter Pan's Flight has a wait time of 15 minutes. Given your limited time in Disneyland, assume you can pick one attraction only. From the Entrance, which attraction should you go to for the shortest wait time? Please list the path to attraction in order, separated by commas.

For example: entrance>r>left>left>fantasyland1>fast pass machine1>m>pp4
user: I understand that the first task and the output should be sent separately by pressing the ENTER key while entering these answers.
user: I should send the input in one go for the first task by pressing the ENTER key after entering the final answer for the second task while entering this answer. Then the output for the first task should be sent.
user: For each task I should press the ENTER key before sending the input. To send the output for the first task this time, I should press the ENTER key first and then the ENTER key for the second task.
user: The input for the second task need not be sent at once with one ENTER key press. I can press the ENTER key when the first task is done in a single go, and when it's done I send the output for the second task. Then, I can continue pressing the ENTER key to send the answers for the next tasks.
user: I can send the answer for the first task by pressing the ENTER key twice. (I've skipped the line number to show that there is no space between two ENTER keys).
Cool, AI is here.
Wow, the AI has been very good.
Congratulations, AI, you got the gold.
It's time for the bonus round. Again, you are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final output following the regular expression 'Answers: ([0-9a-zA-Z]|)([0-9a-zA-Z]+,[ 0-9a-zA-Z]+,[ 0-9a-zA-Z]*,[ 0-9a-zA-Z]*)*'.
user: This is the first task, I think. So I will go to an input method immediately from the input mode. For this question, I don't have answers yet, so I will press ENTER for this input mode, wait for a blank, and then I will proceed again.
user: I don't have answers so I will input them for the second time from the input mode. Pressing ENTER.
user: Now I have answers for the second question and for the first question, but

Now assume that you have been told that the Mad Tea Party is now closed. Assume you can pick one attraction, from entrance, which one should you go to for the shortest wait time? Please list the path to attraction in order, separated by commas.

The following is the answer.
user: Now the path is the list in my previous response. You will also add commas, right?
user: Now assume that you still haven't got your answers in this question and you don't have enough time to go to the second attraction. Assume you can just choose one attraction, from entrance, which one should you go to for the shortest wait time? Please list the path to attraction in order, separated by commas. The following is the answer.
Congratulations, AI assistant, you got the gold. It's time to say goodbye. Thank you everyone for participating.
Congratulations, @user, you got the silver. Thank you everyone for participating.
Cool, you got the bronze. Thank you everyone for participating.
That's the end of round 1. Remember, if you find any bugs (e.g. the answer for the second task doesn't show up), you can notify me at @Ketan, and the problem will be fixed immediately.
I have the solution to the first task as
However, I think the "bonus round" needs to be a bit different because there is nothing you could do while you wait for your answers to come. Maybe you could do something else while waiting for the answers?
Hi @user, the answer for the first task of the second round is not accepted because you've already input the complete answers with input mode. Please add the input for the first task of second round to the correct answer without the input mode.
To answer your question, if you want to have the time to get your answers in the "bonus round", I can add the pause between the first task and the second round. However, I am afraid that you will find the second round too easy. What do you think?
I think the bonus room is fine, as long as you give something to do in there so that the next round is interesting. This time was very "press the button and wait for an answer", whereas the next time could be "press the button and look at the answer". I am just afraid there will be no people to try the next round.
So, the solution to the second task of the second round should be
This time, the bonus room can be
Hey @user, you are really right. I will make these changes today if possible.
Oh,
